translation.en: Yo, dawg.
translation.zh: 嘿 兄弟

translation.en: Konnichiwa.
translation.zh: “柯尼吉娃”

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Konnichiwa. Konnichiwa means, "What's up?"
translation.zh: 柯尼吉娃是日语“你好” 的意思

translation.en: So what the fuck's up? We know what it means.
translation.zh: -他妈的你好！-我们知道那句话的意思

translation.en: Hey, you want a smoke?

translation.en: You can read the paper through this, it's so clean.

translation.en: A couple of hits, you'll be fucking like beasts.

translation.en: You boys like pussy, right? Hey!
translation.zh: -你们喜欢女人吧？-嘿！

translation.en: Do we look like fucking tweakers to you?

translation.en: So you got the shit or not? Yeah. You?

translation.en: What the fuck is this? We said a machine gun.

translation.en: It is a machine gun.

translation.en: The kind you can carry.
translation.zh: 要能拿着走的

translation.en: Couldn't get none of those.
translation.zh: 你一定不能没有它

translation.en: This baby's got character. Korean War vintage.
translation.zh: 这枝枪可是韩战时用的

translation.en: Maybe even mowed down one of your grandpapa- sans
translation.zh: 也许你祖先跑向仁川边界时

translation.en: when he was charging the wire at Inch'on.
translation.zh: 就是被这把枪射死的

translation.en: This is bullshit. It's fucking stuck.
translation.zh: 鬼扯 它卡住了 算了 车子卖你三千元就好车牌没问题

translation.en: Fuck it, take the ride. Three large. VIN's clean.
translation.zh: 算了 车子卖你三千元就好车牌没问题

translation.en: Nigga, I drive a $100,000 car!
translation.zh: 黑鬼 我开十万元名车！

translation.en: We want your faggoty-ass ride, we'll jack it from you.
translation.zh: 我们要你的破车 就用抢的

translation.en: Cool. Don't decide right now.
translation.zh: 酷 别现在决定

translation.en: Konnichiwa is Japanese. It's insulting to Koreans.
translation.zh: 柯尼吉娃是日语 简直侮辱韩国人

translation.en: How am I supposed to tell if you can't?
translation.zh: 连你都分不清 我哪知道？

translation.en: What the fuck is that supposed to mean, white boy?
translation.zh: 什么意思 白鬼？

translation.en: It means you got eyes like apostrophes, you dress white, talk black and drive Jew.
translation.zh: 你长一双凤眼 穿得像白人讲话像黑人 开犹太人名车

translation.en: So, how am I supposed to know what kind of zipperhead,
translation.zh: 你没说我哪知道

translation.en: dog-munching dink you are if you don't?
translation.zh: 你是大饼脸韩国人还是吃狗肉的越南人？

translation.en: Yo.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Do you know who the fuck we are?
translation.zh: 你知道我们是谁吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 知道

translation.en: You're a couple of panheads buying a machine gun out of a trunk.
translation.zh: 你们是想要买机关枪的黄种混蛋

translation.en: Wassup, you son of a bitch?
translation.zh: 什么 你找死啊？

translation.en: Pick him up. Get your ass up.
translation.zh: -扁他-起来啊

translation.en: I'm getting the shit out of here.
translation.zh: 我要把车开走

translation.en: Give me the keys!
translation.zh: 把钥匙给我！

translation.en: Konnichiwa, bitch. Let's go!
translation.zh: -“柯尼吉娃” 娘娘腔-走吧！

translation.en: Where?
translation.zh: 在哪？

translation.en: It's okay. I'm a cop.
translation.zh: 没事了 我是警察

translation.en: Captain Wander, congratulations on breaking the case.
translation.zh: 汪德队长 恭喜破案了

translation.en: Can you tell me how you found the twins?
translation.zh: 你怎么找到双胞胎的？

translation.en: Julie, my people had turned the city upside down looking for these girls.
translation.zh: 茱莉 我的部下为寻找这两个女孩翻遍整个城市

translation.en: I could not be prouder of my men.
translation.zh: 我为他们感到骄傲

translation.en: OFFICER: Ma'am, excuse me.
translation.zh: 我先失陪了

translation.en: How can you shoot a guy taking a dump?
translation.zh: 你怎能对正在上大号的人开枪？

translation.en: I mean, seriously. That... That's sacred.
translation.zh: 说真的 那是很神圣的就像在教堂内杀人

translation.en: That's like shooting a man in church. Or a Dodger game.
translation.zh: 说真的 那是很神圣的就像在教堂内杀人 或在棒球场上

translation.en: Hey, whatever it takes to be a hero. Anytime, anyplace, right, Lud?
translation.zh: 不惜一切都要当英雄对吧 路德？

translation.en: It gets old.
translation.zh: 真俗的笑话

translation.en: I hate these short-eyed, kiddie-raping bastards.
translation.zh: 我恨透这些绑架强奸幼童的畜牲

translation.en: At least kidnap some full-grown ladies with shapes.
translation.zh: 至少绑个身材姣好的熟女

translation.en: Wow. Maybe you should check his closet next, huh, Lud?
translation.zh: 或许下次你该突袭他的衣橱 路德？

translation.en: The girls are being examined by a physician right now.
translation.zh: 小女孩正在接受检查

translation.en: Both twins are in good health
translation.zh: 这对双胞胎情况良好

translation.en: and will be reunited with their family shortly.
translation.zh: 很快就能和家人重聚了

translation.en: SANTOS: tomorrow is gonna say, LA Times front page
translation.zh: 《洛城时报》明天的头版将会是

translation.en: "Vice Detective Rescues Missing Twins."
translation.zh: “副探长救出失踪双胞胎”

translation.en: Detective. Singular.
translation.zh: 警探 单枪匹马

translation.en: Yeah. Like we've been sitting around on our ass
translation.zh: 对 我们好像上个月

translation.en: doing jack-shit in our unit the last month.
translation.zh: 一直待在局里没事做

translation.en: Hey! You two cut the shit. The boss is on his way right now.
translation.zh: 嘿！你们俩别再抱怨了 老板快来了

translation.en: I mean, you could have saved some for us.
translation.zh: 嘿！你们俩别再抱怨了 老板快来了 你该留点事给我们做

translation.en: I did you a solid, Santos. You did me a solid?
translation.zh: 你该留点事给我们做 -我帮了你 桑德斯-你帮我？

translation.en: You want to see their faces every night? You want to be a killer?
translation.zh: 你想每晚都看到他们的脸吗？想杀人吗？

translation.en: You know what? Shut the fuck up.
translation.zh: 你给我闭嘴

translation.en: Hey, hey, what the hell is going on?
translation.zh: 嘿 怎么回事？

translation.en: Hey! This is real professional.
translation.zh: 嘿！你们还真专业啊

translation.en: What if I walked in here with the Chief, huh?
translation.zh: 如果我和警长一起走进来该怎么办？

translation.en: Santos, deploy your ass outside.
translation.zh: 桑德斯 滚出去

translation.en: Find Ted Berman and make sure that that crime scene log is in order.
translation.zh: 找泰德伯曼确认犯罪现场纪录完整

translation.en: Yes, sir. Run along, boy.
translation.zh: -是 长官-小子 用跑的

translation.en: SANTOS: Shut the fuck up.
translation.zh: -是 长官-小子 用跑的 闭嘴

translation.en: WANDER: Hey, secure that bullshit, all right? Both of you.
translation.zh: 嘿 你们俩别再吵了好吗？

translation.en: Clady, you take DeMille back to the barn and start writing.
translation.zh: 克雷地 你和德米尔回局里开始写报告

translation.en: I want something to red-pin by midnight.
translation.zh: 我要在午夜前看到报告

translation.en: Tell those body monkeys to get right in here.
translation.zh: 请验尸官进来吧

translation.en: You got it, Cap. Let's go.
translation.zh: 知道了 队长我们走吧

translation.en: This is crazy!
translation.zh: 真不可思议！

translation.en: You fucked them up!
translation.zh: 你把他们全干掉了！

translation.en: This is beautiful.
translation.zh: 太厉害了！

translation.en: And that machine gun shit, that was perfect.
translation.zh: 还有机关枪那招太正点了

translation.en: I know you hated waiting, but it's better this way.
translation.zh: 我知道你不喜欢等 不过这样更好

translation.en: Yeah. I... You all right?
translation.zh: -你还好吗？-还好 我…

translation.en: I got shot. Yeah, but you okay?
translation.zh: -我中枪了-你还好把？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm okay, Jack.
translation.zh: 我还好 杰克

translation.en: 'Cause I know you're not tripping about these... These assholes right here?
translation.zh: 因为我知道你该不会为这些混蛋难过吧？

translation.en: Fuck them. Screw them.
translation.zh: 人渣 败类

translation.en: You went toe-to-toe with evil and you won.
translation.zh: 你和恶魔正面交锋 赢得胜利

translation.en: You saved those girls. This is lovely, Tommy.
translation.zh: 拯救了那些女孩 真是太棒了 汤米

translation.en: Come here. Come here, man. Give me... Give me a hug!
translation.zh: 过来 老弟 给我一个拥抱！

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: What you hiding from? Ribs are tender.
translation.zh: -轻点 肋骨很痛-你在躲什么？

translation.en: What you hiding from? Nothing.
translation.zh: -没什么-你在躲什么？

translation.en: You've been drinking.
translation.zh: 你喝酒了？

translation.en: You know that... That thing they say about vodka?
translation.zh: 喝了伏特加后嗅不到酒味的传闻

translation.en: How you can't smell it?
translation.zh: 你听过吗？

translation.en: It's bullshit. The D.A.'s shooting team is en route right now.
translation.zh: 谁会嗅不到枪案检察官正在路上

translation.en: And you're not ready for public consumption.
translation.zh: 你这样子不能应对媒体

translation.en: So, come on. I want to get you to a hospital,
translation.zh: 走吧 我把你弄到医院去

translation.en: get you away from all those guys. Come on.
translation.zh: 让你避开那些人 走吧

translation.en: All right. Thanks, Jack.
translation.zh: 谢了 杰克

translation.en: I think we can do some damage control.
translation.zh: 我想我们应该采取措施控制损害程度

translation.en: If it ain't LA's deadliest white boy.
translation.zh: 你该不会是洛城最致命的小子吧

translation.en: Aren't you on the wrong side of the yellow tape?
translation.zh: 你是不是搞错封锁线的方向了？

translation.en: Congrats on four more notches for your gun belt.
translation.zh: 恭喜 你又可以炫耀多杀四个人了

translation.en: I'll be praying for the families of your victims.
translation.zh: 我会为受害者的家人祈祷

translation.en: They're called suspects.
translation.zh: 他们是嫌疑犯

translation.en: The victims are the 14-year-old school girls the suspects kept in a cage
translation.zh: 两名受害女童只有十四岁她们被嫌疑犯关在笼里

translation.en: and sold to chicken hawks to poke, prod and put on the Internet.
translation.zh: 还被放到网上拍卖给恋童癖的人猥亵

translation.en: Suspects, Washington.
translation.zh: 他们是嫌疑犯 华盛顿

translation.en: Suspects.
translation.zh: 嫌疑犯！

translation.en: As evil as those men were, they had a right to trial.
translation.zh: 就算那些人罪大恶极仍有接受审讯的权利

translation.en: There's gonna be some blowback from the Korean community on this one.
translation.zh: 韩国某些单位会插手这案子

translation.en: Now that you're all militant, why don't you just say it?
translation.zh: 既然你那么好斗 何不有话直说？

translation.en: You think I'm a racist.
translation.zh: 你认为我有种族歧视

translation.en: You have another explanation? No, I don't.
translation.zh: -你有别的解释吗？-没有

translation.en: Because if I roll and determine the suspects are black, yellow or brown,
translation.zh: 因为如果我发现嫌疑犯是黑人黄种人或拉丁裔人

translation.en: I'll blow them out of their socks.
translation.zh: 我会杀个片甲不留

translation.en: But if they're white, I'll give them a ride home.
translation.zh: 但如果是白人 我会送他们回家

translation.en: You know why? 'Cause I'm a racist. Fuck you.
translation.zh: 知道为什么吗？因为我有种族歧视 操你的！

translation.en: Man, I would give my right arm to have that shit on tape.
translation.zh: 我会不惜一切代价把你说的话录下来

translation.en: What happened to you, Terrence? We used to be brothers.
translation.zh: 你怎么了 塔伦斯？ 我们曾是好兄弟

translation.en: Hey, hey, stay on point. Washington, you stay on point.
translation.zh: 嘿 华盛顿 别乱来 公私分明

translation.en: Always, Captain Wander. Always.
translation.zh: 汪德队长 我一直都是

translation.en: Tom. Come on, let's get you out of here.
translation.zh: 汤姆 走吧 我们走吧

translation.en: Don't go near that piece of shit. He's got it coming, Jack.
translation.zh: -别再靠近那家伙-他会得到报应的 杰克

translation.en: Do not go near him. You stay away, far away.
translation.zh: 别再靠近他 离他远远的

translation.en: Fuck him. That's an order.
translation.zh: -操他的！-这是命令

translation.en: I'm waiting for Nurse Garcia.
translation.zh: 我在等葛莉丝护士

translation.en: I did the same thing with this girl once.
translation.zh: 我也曾做过类似的事

translation.en: She was a waitress at a jazz bar.
translation.zh: 她是酒吧里的女服务生

translation.en: And I'd sit in her section, wouldn't let anybody else serve me.
translation.zh: 我坐在她负责的那区除她以外 我不让其他人服务

translation.en: She'd change sections, I'd change tables.
translation.zh: 她换区 我就跟着换桌

translation.en: Persistence. That's the key.
translation.zh: 坚持是成功的关键

translation.en: Wait a second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: You're that cop! You're... I just seen your face on TV.
translation.zh: 你是那名警察！我刚在电视上看到你

translation.en: You rescued those twins in Koreatown, right?
translation.zh: 你从韩国城救出那对双胞胎 对吧？

translation.en: Are you okay? Did you get shot?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？你中枪了？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Who the hell are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: Me? I sell insurance, life, auto, casualty.
translation.zh: 我？我卖保险人寿 汽车 意外保险

translation.en: Wow, that's some heavy shit, man.
translation.zh: 哇 你真不简单耶

translation.en: So those guys, they... They shot first, right?
translation.zh: 那些家伙先开枪 对吧？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Whole city was looking for those kids.
translation.zh: 城里所有人都在找那两个小孩

translation.en: How'd you find them?
translation.zh: 你怎么找到她们的？

translation.en: That's my job.
translation.zh: 那是我的职责

translation.en: WOMAN: Sergeant Green, Sergeant Green...
translation.zh: -葛林中士-打扰了 队长

translation.en: Excuse me, Captain. Sorry to interrupt.
translation.zh: -葛林中士-打扰了 队长 抱歉打断你

translation.en: Deputy Chief Sorensen is trying to raise you on a simplex.
translation.zh: 苏瑞森副警长用无线电呼叫你

translation.en: Insurance, Tom. I sell insurance.
translation.zh: 保险 汤姆 我卖保险

translation.en: If you ever need any, and you will, why don't you give me a call?
translation.zh: 有保险 才有保障 打个电话给我吧

translation.en: No one has to know but us. Not Clady, not Wander, no one.
translation.zh: 除了你我 别人不必知道 克雷地 汪德都不必知道

translation.en: Listen, for your own good,
translation.zh: 听着 为了你好

translation.en: don't get yourself so far out there that I can't reel you back.
translation.zh: 别太离谱否则我也救不了你

translation.en: See you sometime.
translation.zh: 后会有期

translation.en: Who was that?
translation.zh: 他是谁？

translation.en: A cop who burns cops. Jesus.
translation.zh: 内部调查的警察 老天

translation.en: Who? Nobody, Grace.
translation.zh: -谁？-没有 葛莉丝

translation.en: Hi. Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨

translation.en: Hold this.
translation.zh: 拿好

translation.en: You know, you can just stop by sometime.
translation.zh: 你平常想看我 可以直接过来

translation.en: You don't have to get shot when you want to see me.
translation.zh: 不必非得弄个枪伤

translation.en: (GROANING) Why? I like it like this. Don't you?
translation.zh: 为什么？我喜欢这样 妳不喜欢吗？

translation.en: No, I don't. (SIGHS) I don't.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢

translation.en: No. Don't get close to me.
translation.zh: 不 别靠近我

translation.en: I work here. I'm not losing my license for you.
translation.zh: 我在这里工作 可不想为了你丢饭碗

translation.en: No. I'm a cop.
translation.zh: -我是警察-不行

translation.en: Whatever.
translation.zh: 管它的

translation.en: TOM: I kicked the door after identifying myself as a police officer.
translation.zh: 我在表明自己是警察后 就把门踹开

translation.en: Upon entry, I was fired upon by a suspect in the living room with a silver automatic.
translation.zh: 我一进去 客厅里有一名嫌犯手持银色手枪朝我开枪

translation.en: I returned fire, he goes down.
translation.zh: 我开枪反击 他就倒地了

translation.en: Then I'm hit in the torso by shotgun fire from the second suspect.
translation.zh: 后来我被第二名嫌犯打中

translation.en: Point of entry?
translation.zh: 你从哪进去？

translation.en: Front door on the west side of the structure.
translation.zh: 建筑物西侧的大门

translation.en: OFFICER: Why didn't you call for backup?
translation.zh: 你为何不请求支援？

translation.en: Exigent circumstances.
translation.zh: 情况危急

translation.en: I heard screams emanating from the house and ascertained a crime was in progress.
translation.zh: 我听到屋里有尖叫声确定里头有人正在犯罪

translation.en: ...saying something. Take care, Silk.
translation.zh: （恭喜西尔基任职35周年） -说些话吧-保重

translation.en: It was great working with you. Thanks a lot.
translation.zh: -很高兴与你共事-谢了

translation.en: Now it's a party.
translation.zh: 派对开始了

translation.en: Oh, my goodness! Now it's a binge, Captain.
translation.zh: 老天！大酒鬼来了 队长

translation.en: What's up, killer? Steady.
translation.zh: -你好 杀手？-走稳点

translation.en: Steady. Yeah, he's in.
translation.zh: 走稳点 很好 他坐下了

translation.en: What's with you? What, Clady give you a happy ending?
translation.zh: 干嘛那么高兴？怎样 克雷地让你很爽？

translation.en: Is that any way to address a commander?
translation.zh: 可以换个方式和指挥官说话吗？

translation.en: I got the call from the Chief this morning. Badge ceremony's next week.
translation.zh: 我今早接到警长的电话下礼拜举行授勋仪式

translation.en: Congratulations, boss.
translation.zh: 恭喜你 老大

translation.en: Hey. We're gonna have the keys to the city.
translation.zh: 嘿 我们是城里的老大耶

translation.en: You believe that shit? They're crowning him king.
translation.zh: 相信吗？他们封他为国王

translation.en: Let's get a toast to that. A toast to the king!
translation.zh: 让我们举杯敬贺国王！

translation.en: King Wander! King Wander!
translation.zh: -汪德国王！-汪德国王！

translation.en: Yo, boss. Can I be your driver when you make chief?
translation.zh: 你当警长时 我能当你的司机吗？

translation.en: WANDER: You got it. You got it. Whatever you want.
translation.zh: 没问题 要什么都行

translation.en: You know, I owe you one, Tom.
translation.zh: 我欠你一次 汤姆

translation.en: That Park twins caper, that gave me the edge.
translation.zh: 派克双胞胎那案子助了我一臂之力

translation.en: You know, the Chief, he's breaking tradition by promoting me here.
translation.zh: 警长破例把我升职

translation.en: The first commander slot always goes to the head of Internal Affairs.
translation.zh: 担任首席指挥官的人往往都是处理内部处分的负责人

translation.en: That's the way it is.
translation.zh: 一直都是

translation.en: That's because they got so much dirt on everyone.
translation.zh: 他们握有大家的把柄 没错 他们总是贪得无厌不停寻找 对吧？

translation.en: That's right, and they're always looking for more, huh?
translation.zh: 没错 他们总是贪得无厌不停寻找 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: You know this prick?
translation.zh: 你认识这家伙吗？

translation.en: Came at me like Joe Concerned Citizen, asking procedural questions.
translation.zh: 装成一个普通市民跑来问我程序上的问题

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, we got a history, this little...
translation.zh: 对 我们曾经交锋

translation.en: See, if you showed up during the daytime,

translation.zh: 你一点也不配当指挥官

translation.en: You like Tom, don't you?
translation.zh: 你喜欢汤姆 对吧？

translation.en: I saw the way you watched him when he came in.
translation.zh: 当他走进来时 我看到你看他的样子

translation.en: That's why you follow him around, you want him to give you a blow job.
translation.zh: 所以你才会缠着他 想要他帮你吹箫

translation.en: Like that hooker I caught you with when we were sergeants.
translation.zh: 就像我们还是警官时被我逮到你召妓

translation.en: Shut up, Jack. You remember?
translation.zh: -记得吗？-闭嘴 杰克

translation.en: Does your wife know that you use prostitutes, Jimmy?
translation.zh: 你老婆知道你召妓吗 吉米？

translation.en: It was the best head I ever had.
translation.zh: 那是我有史以来最棒的吹箫

translation.en: And what about you, Jack?
translation.zh: 你呢 杰克？

translation.en: You always found it hard to keep your prick out of the ghetto.
translation.zh: 你一直都在贫民窟里找妓女

translation.en: It's a two-way street, buddy. You can't ride the tiger forever.
translation.zh: 这是双向的你无法永远骑在老虎头上追求权力

translation.en: Now get the hell out of my office.
translation.zh: 现在给我滚出办公室 帮局里一个忙

translation.en: Do the department a favor,
translation.zh: 帮局里一个忙

translation.en: and wash your mouth out with buckshot.
translation.zh: 你真该毙了自己

translation.en: Come on, Tom. Let's get out of here.
translation.zh: 走吧 汤姆 我们走

translation.en: From his time on the street to his time in your schools and homes,
translation.zh: 从他在街上打击犯罪到他在学校与家里的时光

translation.en: Detective Washington was tireless
translation.zh: 华盛顿警探始终如一

translation.en: in his devotion to his church, his love for his family,
translation.zh: 把自己奉献给教堂 家庭

translation.en: and his dedication to this department.
translation.zh: 以及警局

translation.en: Uniform Detail. Atten-hut!
translation.zh: 以及警局 全体警员 请起立！

translation.en: OFFICER: Honor Guard, port arms!
translation.zh: 军仪队 举枪！

translation.en: Half right face!
translation.zh: 右转！

translation.en: Ready, aim, fire!
translation.zh: 准备 瞄准 开枪！

translation.en: Aim, fire! Aim, fire!
translation.zh: 瞄准 开枪！

translation.en: Uniform Detail, present arms!
translation.zh: 全体警员 敬礼！

translation.en: MAN: He was a good guy. We'll miss him.
translation.zh: 他是个勇敢的家伙 我们会想念他

translation.en: We'll go back to work now. Back to work.
translation.zh: 回去工作了

translation.en: Let's go get them. Listen, that was a nice speech. Thank you.
translation.zh: -你讲得真好 谢谢-我们走吧

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Mrs. Washington.
translation.zh: 华盛顿太太

translation.en: I was first on scene.
translation.zh: 我是第一个抵达现场的

translation.en: Yeah, of course you were.
translation.zh: 是呀 当然是你呀

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.zh: 借一下

translation.en: You Diskant?
translation.zh: 你是迪斯肯特？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: You're working Washington?
translation.zh: 你在处理华盛顿的案子？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: You know who I am?
translation.zh: 知道我是谁吗？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: You planning on interviewing me?
translation.zh: 你要侦讯我？

translation.en: You're on my list.
translation.zh: 你在我名单上

translation.en: Well, let's get rolling. Where do I start?
translation.zh: 好 开始吧 从哪儿开始？

translation.en: Gang books? Mug shots? 211 reports?
translation.zh: 帮派名册？嫌犯照片？抢匪报告？

translation.en: If you want.
translation.zh: 如果你要的话

translation.en: Come on, Diskant, you've worked a homicide before.
translation.zh: 快点 迪斯肯特 你处理过谋杀案吧

translation.en: I'm two for two.
translation.zh: 办过两个 两个都破案

translation.en: Okay, two for two, you got a ballistics report?
translation.zh: 好 破了两案 你有弹道报告吗？

translation.en: No. The bullets are still at the coroner's.
translation.zh: 没有 子弹还在验尸官那里

translation.en: Yeah, but they're giving you updates, right?
translation.zh: 对 但他们有给你报告吧？

translation.en: They tell you how many different calibers they dug out of Washington?
translation.zh: 他们告诉你华盛顿身上有几种口径的枪伤？

translation.en: How many? What do you want?
translation.zh: -你想干嘛？-几种？

translation.en: Goodbye, Detective.
translation.zh: 再见 警探

translation.en: Hey. Harry!
translation.zh: -哈利！-嘿

translation.en: I thought you were dead.
translation.zh: 我还以为你死了

translation.en: I'm from Vice Special.
translation.zh: 我是扫黑小组的人

translation.en: CORONER: Tom Ludlow. I know who you are.
translation.zh: 汤姆路德洛 我知道你是谁

translation.en: I handled your wife's autopsy.
translation.zh: 我曾帮你老婆验尸

translation.en: That was you? Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: 就是你？

translation.en: The asshole. Remember?
translation.zh: 那个混蛋 记得吗？

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 记得

translation.en: The guy who washed away all the hair and fiber evidence.
translation.zh: 就是你清洗掉所有毛发皮屑证据

translation.en: The guy who wouldn't do a vaginal swab.
translation.zh: 就是你拒绝做性侵犯测试

translation.en: The guy who left me nothing to go on.
translation.zh: 就是你让我毫无证据可查

translation.en: It's not my job to investigate adultery.
translation.zh: 调查通奸不是我的职责

translation.en: How can I help you?
translation.zh: 我能帮你什么吗？

translation.en: Pulled these out of Washington? Yup.
translation.zh: -让我看华盛顿的档案-好

translation.en: Eighteen rounds.
translation.zh: 中了18发子弹

translation.en: Ten .45-caliber full metal jackets.
translation.zh: 点45口径手枪10发

translation.en: Seven 9-mil FMJs.
translation.zh: 9厘米穿甲弹7发

translation.en: And a single .38 hollow-point mushroomed against his scapula.
translation.zh: 还有一发点38的中空弹射穿他的肩胛

translation.en: Serious overkill.
translation.zh: 死状凄惨

translation.en: He must have really pissed off the shooters.
translation.zh: 他一定很痛恨这些枪手

translation.en: DISKANT: Get what you're looking for?
translation.zh: 看到你想看的了吗？

translation.en: Hi, I'm Detective Diskant. We spoke on the phone earlier.
translation.zh: 嗨 我是迪斯肯特警探稍早时我们通过电话

translation.en: How you doing? I'm here for the ballistics evidence.
translation.zh: -我来拿弹道证据-你好

translation.en: DISKANT: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: When can I expect your report?
translation.zh: 报告何时会好？

translation.en: CORONER: Give me about an hour or so. The lab's backlogged today.
translation.zh: 我想大约一小时 实验室今天很忙

translation.en: Thanks. Can you fax it to my office?
translation.zh: -谢谢 能传真到我办公室吗？-当然可以

translation.en: Thank you, Doc. Sure can.
translation.zh: -谢谢 能传真到我办公室吗？-当然可以 谢谢你 医师

translation.en: Diskant, talk to me.
translation.zh: 迪斯肯特 告诉我

translation.en: You got three different calibers, that means three weapons.
translation.zh: 有三种不同的口径也就是说有三种枪枝

translation.en: What's your take on what went down in that market?
translation.zh: 就你推测超市当时发生什么事？

translation.en: Two bad guys come in the front door to rob the place.
translation.zh: 两名坏蛋从前门进来抢劫

translation.en: One of them sees the clerk, cuts him in half.
translation.zh: 其中一人看到店员 朝他连续开枪

translation.en: The other one sees Washington,
translation.zh: 另一人的枪已上膛

translation.en: whose weapon is already drawn, empties his clip into him.
translation.zh: 当他看到华盛顿时就开枪射光子弹

translation.en: His buddy joins the party till he runs dry.
translation.zh: 他的伙伴也来掺一脚 直到子弹用尽

translation.en: And one of them pulls a two-incher,
translation.zh: 一人拿点38手枪

translation.en: pumps a final "fuck you" round into Washington's back.
translation.zh: 很生气地开了最后一枪射中华盛顿的背

translation.en: They leave, you show up
translation.zh: 他们跑掉 你出现时 他们已经走了

translation.en: after they're gone.
translation.zh: 你出现时 他们已经走了

translation.en: You got it all figured out.
translation.zh: 你全都知道了

translation.en: I got your back here, but you got to keep your distance and let me work this case.
translation.zh: 我会罩你 但你得离远点让我好好办事

translation.en: No one's gonna find these assholes. Is that what you need to hear from me?
translation.zh: 没人会发现的你是不是想听我这么说？

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me?
translation.zh: 你在耍我？

translation.en: They get a pass, you get a pass. That's the deal, right?
translation.zh: 他们和你都没事 约定好的吧？

translation.en: What are you talking about, the shooters get a pass?
translation.zh: 你说枪手没事是什么意思？

translation.en: I don't understand, Clady said you were on board.
translation.zh: 我不懂 克雷地说你同意的

translation.en: Not with this.
translation.zh: 不是这个

translation.en: What's the deal, are you throwing this case for a promotion?
translation.zh: 约定什么 你破案后升官？

translation.en: If I were you, I'd be more worried about yourself.
translation.zh: 如果我是你 我会比较担心自己

translation.en: Hey, you piece of shit! You got a 187 on a peace officer
translation.zh: 嘿 你这混蛋！你处理的是杀警案

translation.en: and you're fucking letting the suspects walk!
translation.zh: 怎能让嫌犯逍遥法外？

translation.en: That doesn't piss you off? You want these guys found?
translation.zh: -你想逮他们？-你不生气吗？ -让他们指证你？-你不生气吗？

translation.en: Doesn't it piss you off? So they can put you at the store?
translation.zh: -让他们指证你？-你不生气吗？ 指证你当时在店里？

translation.en: Place you at the store before the shooting?
translation.zh: 指证你当时在店里？ 你想因执法不当而被审判吗？

translation.en: You want to catch a felony for obstruction?
translation.zh: 你想因执法不当而被审判吗？ 如果我说你不在场 你就不在场

translation.en: If I say you weren't there, you weren't there.
translation.zh: 如果我说你不在场 你就不在场

translation.en: This is your mess and I'm cleaning it up.
translation.zh: 这是你闯的祸而我在替你收拾烂摊子

translation.en: Yeah, it pisses me off!
translation.zh: 对 我很生气！

translation.en: Diskant.
translation.zh: 迪斯肯特

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: Yes. Hang on one second.
translation.zh: 是 等一下

translation.en: All right, go ahead.
translation.zh: 好了 请说

translation.en: All right, thank you. Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 好 谢谢 拜拜

translation.en: Fremont and Coates.
translation.zh: 法拉蒙和库兹 鉴证组在店外头找到的烟蒂和头巾上发现唾液

translation.en: The lab found saliva on a cigarette butt and the bandana outside the store.
translation.zh: 鉴证组在店外头找到的烟蒂和头巾上发现唾液

translation.en: DNA corresponds to those two names.
translation.zh: DNA和这两人相符

translation.en: Congratulations, you IDed the shooters.
translation.zh: 恭喜 你找到枪手了

translation.en: Yeah. Normally, I'd be pretty happy.
translation.zh: 对 通常我会很高兴的

translation.en: Pull their rap sheets. Give me copies.
translation.zh: 去拿他们的犯案纪绿 给我复本

translation.en: I'll see you around.
translation.zh: 待会见

translation.en: Computer says you arrested these guys.
translation.zh: 电脑纪录上说你逮捕过这些人

translation.en: Fremont and Coates.
translation.zh: 法拉蒙和库兹

translation.en: Good guys. Say hi for me.
translation.zh: 好样的 代我问候他们

translation.en: You remember them?
translation.zh: 你记得他们吗？

translation.en: Who can forget? Heroin dealers with a taste for blood.
translation.zh: 谁忘得了？嗜血成性的毒贩

translation.en: Came up from Belize to make a sale and they liked the Southland so much,
translation.zh: 从贝里斯来的毒贩他们喜欢加州南部

translation.en: they never left.
translation.zh: 从没离开过 对 这两位先生因为抢劫强奸罪而被捕

translation.en: Yeah. We hooked these two fine gentlemen on a rape-mutilation caper.
translation.zh: 对 这两位先生因为抢劫强奸罪而被捕

translation.en: Seems they had a three-day hostage-fest with this cute little Guatemalan chick
translation.zh: 他们把一名瓜地马拉女孩绑架了三天

translation.en: that they snatched up when she was walking home from dental school.
translation.zh: 趁她从牙医学校走回家时绑她

translation.en: They hurt her bad.
translation.zh: 她被伤得很重

translation.en: Then why are they on the street? SANTOS: They walked from the beef.
translation.zh: -那么他们为何还在街上？-他们获得保释

translation.en: One of our own felt we violated
translation.zh: 有警员觉得我们侵犯库兹先生和法拉蒙先生的公民权

translation.en: Mr. Coates' and Mr. Fremont's civil rights and told the City Attorney.
translation.zh: 有警员觉得我们侵犯库兹先生和法拉蒙先生的公民权 并向市府律师检举

translation.en: Washington dimed you out? Yep.
translation.zh: -华盛顿检举你们？-是的

translation.en: Why do you think they put the dude in Community Relations?
translation.zh: 不然他们怎会把他调到社区关系部去？

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
translation.zh: 你在耍我吗？

translation.en: Washington kicked loose the very guys who whacked him?
translation.zh: 华盛顿放了这些坏蛋反而被他们杀死？

translation.en: Damn ironic, isn't it?
translation.zh: 真讽刺 不是吗？

translation.en: Oh, guys! What is this, a garage sale?
translation.zh: 嘿 各位！怎么回事？车库大拍卖吗？

translation.en: How you doing, Lud? What's this? Why...
translation.zh: 你好 路德？这是什么？

translation.en: Lud, why do you have this?
translation.zh: 路德 你为什么有这些？

translation.en: Those are the shitbags who popped Washington.
translation.zh: 就是这些混蛋杀害华盛顿

translation.en: Sarge, we can get these guys.
translation.zh: 警官 我们能逮捕他们

translation.en: No, no. Not if you want to keep your badge.
translation.zh: 不 你想保住警徽的话就不要

translation.en: Besides, these two animals? These guys, they'll take care of each other.
translation.zh: 而且这两个畜牲会互相残杀的

translation.en: They'll be dead by the end of the week.
translation.zh: 他们这周末就可能死去 也许这两个人会朝对方开枪

translation.en: Probably shoot each other's fucking faces off, knowing these two.
translation.zh: 也许这两个人会朝对方开枪 你知道的

translation.en: You know how that shit works. This week's suspects, next week's victims, right?
translation.zh: 这周是嫌犯下周就是遇害者 对吧？

translation.en: Yeah, right.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here, Tom?
translation.zh: 你来干嘛 汤姆？

translation.en: Let's talk.
translation.zh: 我们谈谈吧

translation.en: I'm sick of this shit, man.
translation.zh: 我受够了

translation.en: It's the same damn song for three years.
translation.zh: 三年以来都一样

translation.en: Crying about your wife.
translation.zh: 为你老婆哭泣

translation.en: She's gone, Tom.
translation.zh: 她已经死了 汤姆

translation.en: What's it gonna take to bring you back from Mars?
translation.zh: 如何才能让你回到真实世界？

translation.en: Have I ever asked you for anything?
translation.zh: 我有求过你什么事吗？

translation.en: You know what? You ask me for shit all the time.
translation.zh: 知道吗？你经常求我

translation.en: Big things, Jack. Important things.
translation.zh: 我是指真正重大的事 杰克

translation.en: What's up, Tom?
translation.zh: 什么事 汤姆？

translation.en: Give me a green light to take out the assholes who did Washington.
translation.zh: 请准许我去毙了枪杀华盛顿的凶手

translation.en: Come on, Jack. King's X.
translation.zh: 拜托 杰克 请下圣旨

translation.en: What the hell is this?
translation.zh: 你在说什么？

translation.en: I can lay them out like I did those Koreans, but off the books.
translation.zh: 我会毙了他们就像我私自毙了韩国人一样

translation.en: I'm talking shovels and trash bags. Who's gonna know? Who's gonna care?
translation.zh: 我会埋了他们谁会知道？谁会注意？

translation.en: The Koreans?
translation.zh: 韩国人？

translation.en: That... That was business.
translation.zh: 那是公事

translation.en: This? This is some crazy bullshit rattling around in that drunk-ass mind of yours.
translation.zh: 你就是喝太多才会有这些乱七八糟的想法

translation.en: Look at yourself! Look at yourself, Tom! You're a mess!
translation.zh: 看看你自己！汤姆！你真是糟透了！

translation.en: When did you start drinking today?
translation.zh: 你今天何时开始喝的？

translation.en: Your little airplane bottles of vodka?
translation.zh: 你那些小瓶的伏特加

translation.en: And you drove over here intoxicated. You want a second DUI?
translation.zh: 你喝醉还开车过来你想因酒驾再次被逮吗？

translation.en: No one's going to fuck with me, Jack! You're not listening to me!
translation.zh: 没有人能阻止我 杰克！你没在听我说！

translation.en: You're not listening to me!
translation.zh: 你没在听我说！

translation.en: No, you listen to me!
translation.zh: 不 你听我说！

translation.en: This is much bigger than that.
translation.zh: 这件事比那件事更重要

translation.en: Do you think Biggs is stupid?
translation.zh: 你以为比吉斯是笨蛋？

translation.en: He's got a PhD in catching cops slipping.
translation.zh: 他是逮捕违法警察的专家

translation.en: You know this. You know all this.
translation.zh: 你知道的 你非常清楚

translation.en: You got to hold your mud.
translation.zh: 你必须坚强撑下去

translation.en: Can you do that?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: It's time to turn the page and close the book.
translation.zh: 你该放下过去 着手未来

translation.en: They took $200?
translation.zh: 他们拿走两百元？

translation.en: I... I forgot about it till I saw this.
translation.zh: 我看到这个才想起来

translation.en: That's the man.
translation.zh: 就是这个人

translation.en: That's him.
translation.zh: 就是他

translation.en: He took all my pay.
translation.zh: （荣誉警官退休） 他拿了我的钱说是为了“饼干罐”

translation.en: Said it was for the cookie jar.
translation.zh: 他拿了我的钱说是为了“饼干罐”

translation.en: The cookie jar?
translation.zh: “饼干罐？”

translation.en: That's what he said.
translation.zh: “饼干罐？” 他是那么说的

translation.en: (KNOCKING ON DOOR)
translation.zh: 他是那么说的

translation.en: I'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我马上回来

translation.en: What do you want, Disco?
translation.zh: 你要干嘛 迪斯可？

translation.en: Washington was dirty. He was a piece of shit.
translation.zh: 华盛顿贪污 他是个烂人

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
translation.zh: 你为何告诉我这个？

translation.en: I think you know why.
translation.zh: 我想你知道原因

translation.en: I know why.
translation.zh: 我知道原因

translation.en: Are you recording this, huh? That's a new phone.
translation.zh: -你用这个录音？-那是新手机

translation.en: You working for Internal Affairs?
translation.zh: 你为内部调查组工作？

translation.en: You made one deal.
translation.zh: 你做了一个约定

translation.en: Maybe you made two.
translation.zh: 说不定是两个

translation.en: Captain Biggs flip you to the dark side, punk?
translation.zh: 比吉斯队长怂恿你为黑暗那方做事？

translation.en: You know what?
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: They're right about you.
translation.zh: 他们说得对

translation.en: You are fucking out there.
translation.zh: 你是个疯子

translation.en: From now on, you stay away from me. We don't talk.
translation.zh: 从现在起离我远点我们没啥好说的

translation.en: All right, hold on, Disco. Hold on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 等等 迪斯可 等等

translation.en: I gotta watch my own back these days, you know?
translation.zh: 我这些日子得小心提防别人

translation.en: Come on. Don't be mad.
translation.zh: 拜托 别生气

translation.en: Washington was dirty.
translation.zh: 华盛顿贪污

translation.en: Hit me, princess.
translation.zh: 告诉我实情

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: A couple things.
translation.zh: 有几件事

translation.en: You know we found $50,000 in cash on him at the store.
translation.zh: 我们在店里从他身上搜到五万现钞

translation.en: No, I didn't. That's a lot of cash, but not in itself damning.
translation.zh: 我不知道 那是很大笔钱但并不违法

translation.en: Oh, but this is.

translation.en: They were afraid of Jack.
translation.zh: 他们全都怕杰克

translation.en: They asked me to help.
translation.zh: 他们求我帮忙

translation.en: One day, you will pass the Chief in the hall and he will give you a nod.
translation.zh: 如果你在大厅见到警长他向你点头致意

translation.en: And you will know why.
translation.zh: 你就知道为什么了

translation.en: Because you were right, Tom.
translation.zh: 因为你是正义 汤姆

translation.en: We do need you.
translation.zh: 我们真的需要你
